about.title: JuanDa
about.tagline: I build digital experiences that solve real problems.
about.description: I'm a full-stack developer passionate about technology, design and building things that truly matter. Beyond code, I'm naturally curious, love challenges and believe the best technology is born from understanding people first.
about.facet1_desc: Specialized in React, TypeScript and Node.js. I'm passionate about clean architecture, performance and building interfaces that users love.
about.facet2_desc: Curious, empathetic and hungry to learn. I believe communication and humility are just as important as any technical skill.
about.facet3_desc: Music, visual design, video games and coffee. I find inspiration everywhere and it shows in every project I build.
about.facet4_desc: Clean code, teamwork, quality delivery and always seeking the most elegant solution to the most complex problem.
about.facet5_desc: There's always something new to master. I keep up with the latest trends and enjoy experimenting with emerging technologies.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Some of the projects I've worked on

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: My professional journey
experience.exp1_desc: Built web interfaces with React and TypeScript. Improved app performance by 30% and led the migration to the new design system.
experience.exp2_desc: Built REST APIs with Node.js and NestJS. Collaborated on microservices architecture and PostgreSQL database maintenance.
experience.exp3_desc: Designed and implemented services in Python. Optimized SQL queries and automated internal processes, reducing operational times.
experience.exp4_desc: First professional role. Developed modules with Angular, integrated external APIs and provided technical support to the team.
